title: Did Kamala Harris Bail Out ‘Violent Rioters’ During George Floyd Protests?
subtitle: The claim appeared to stem from a June 2020 tweet from Harris.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: During protests over the police in-custody death of George Floyd in the summer of 2020, Kamala Harris donated money to a Minnesota nonprofit that helped protesters who were arrested get out of jail and break more laws.
